website_summaries.verdict: Thicker than most screen protectors, which provides great protection against drops at a low price.
pros: Contains two screen protectors offered at a very low price
Measures 0.33 mm in thickness, so it'll stand up to rough treatment better than some other options
Does a nice job repelling fingerprints and oils from your hands
cons: Some build quality issues, as some of the protectors may arrived chipped

customer_reviews.title: I am someone who rarely reviews things and this I Definitely Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great quality screen protector. For the price, you get two glass protectors which are quite easy to install and have fantastic thinness and anti glare and anti-smudge properties. Some competitors have a frame which helps with aligning the screen for the iPhone X but for what it lacks, JETech makes up in value for money and pure quality. I have always hated glass screen protectors. I have bought cheap ones, I have bought expensive ones, but this one has been the first I have truly liked.
customer_reviews.author: Faizan Khawaja

customer_reviews.title: 4 THUMBS UP!  Went on perfectly in seconds
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this for the iPhoneX. I bought this to replace an old tempered glass protector that had cracked. I took the old one off, didn't even wipe the screen, placed this new one on and in seconds it adhered perfectly with no dust or bubbles. I also replaced my husbands protector with the same result. Just a little rubbing around the edges on both and it was perfectly done!
customer_reviews.author: KikiD26

customer_reviews.title: Melted on just nicely !
customer_reviews.text: Despite some of the bad reviews I actually had a good experience with this product. People complain it’s not the same size but the edges are round on the iPhone X so of course a flat screen protector isn’t going to cover the whole phone. It’s phone case friendly. Received mine with no cracks or chips. There is a lifetime warranty included with this purchase from the makers. So if there is a problem I’m sure they can help. It was easy to install. It melted on just lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna K

customer_reviews.title: Did not like, had to return
customer_reviews.text: I hated the screen, used it for a few days to give it a chance and it irritated me so much, the screen is way too thick and slippery on your finger, the feel is just not right, the rainbow effect around the edge of the screen is really bad. I returned it and got the max boost brand instead, was a few bucks more but you got three screens & a template to help line it up. Come on, if you buy a $1000 phone, then you can afford more than five dollars for a decent screen protector LOL. Protect your investment!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love My JETech Purchases!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase with JETech and it won’t be my last! I initially bought a screen protector for my iPad (in January) and was super impressed with the quality and the fact that it came with a lifetime warranty. Today (5/1/19) my initial iPad screen protector is still in perfect condition! So, I decided to get one for my iPhone and I came back to JETech! Once again, I am impressed! Two protectors AND lifetime warranty? Doesn’t get better, really!!! Thank you JETech!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd or 3rd purchase and I have not been disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set of screen protectors for my iPhoneX, I have one on my iPhone 6s Plus and my granddaughter's iPhone 7. I trust the products because they protect my phone. I dropped my iPhone 6s Plus on ceramic tiles. The screen protector saved it from cracking. As there is 2 in a pack I was able to remove the cracked screen protector and put on the 2nd one. So when I got my iPhoneX the other day, the first thing I did was get my JETech Screen protector. Protect your valuables with tried and trusted tools. Thank you for speedy shipping and reliable service.
customer_reviews.author: PJEdwards@KickFearNow

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Protect from a 3 Foot Fall.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this product on my iPhone 11 Pro the same day I opened my phone from the box. A few days ago I leaned over to pump air into a bike tire and dropped my phone for the first time. The phone fell face flat onto the driveway. When I picked up my phone, I was saddened to see that not only did the screen protector fail and cracked. My phone Screen was also heavily damaged underneath the screen protector. This screen protector WILL NOT PROTECT your phone from falling, only from minor scratches. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LPS

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector - no micro-scratches!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a graceful person so I definitely need screen protectors in my life. This has survived a couple drops, bumps and spills and my X looks brand new. Easy to apply and adds protection to my iPhone X screen I've used it for about a month and a half now and it does not seem to get those micro-scratches that other protectors do. I love that they give you 2 - so if you mess up the first application you can do it again. I will definitely be repurchasing this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Broke easily... TERRIBLE customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 weeks ago, by the end of the first week I noticed a crack that went across my screen. I didn’t drop my phone, I pulled it out of my pocket and the crack was there... I thought their “lifetime warranty” would’ve covered it, the only problem is, customer service seems to ignore phone calls and emails, so the warranty means nothing if you can’t get ahold of them. Extremely disappointed.. buyers don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: JBalsamo

customer_reviews.title: Too small, leaves gap
customer_reviews.text: Screen protector does not cover entire XS screen and leaves a visible gap on the edges. I’ve broken both protectors now after several drops to the phone because of this placement and significant gap until the edge of the phone case. Will buy another brand that fits better.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great buy! Worth it and it saved it screen! Only thing I wish was that it had more coverage, but, it really works, it does the job, did the job. My co worker dropped a metal object on my phone while trying to put a folder organizer together and dropped it onto my phone, once I realized it, I was pissed! It looked like it cracked my screen, but to my surprise it didn’t! Thank God because I don’t have the money to replace it! Hence the reason for this buy! I will buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana McGee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this product. It was easy to apply, layed completely flat on the screen with no bubbles or gaps along the edges. The hardest part is getting the phone screen clear of all the dust. There are 2 stickers that you put on either end of the protector that helps you align it to the phone screen and handle it without touching any corners. I thought that was super helpful. I’d definitely recommend this screen protector, it looks great and glass protectors are always very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Aud

customer_reviews.title: fine choice among all the options out there
customer_reviews.text: i mainly chose this based on price and the quality does not disappoint. I used another brand that cost more and honestly I cannot tell the difference. it comes with some additional tape that helps you hold the glass for the application. as with any screen protector application, your best success is dependent on cleaning the phone screen well and making sure all dust is removed. i do wish this came with an alcohol swab to clean the screen. it comes with a cleaning cloth and sticker to remove dust. it claims a lifetime warranty but not sure what that really means
customer_reviews.author: Curtis H

customer_reviews.title: Split after applying
customer_reviews.text: After applying there was a long thin crack down the middle (the phone was not dropped) so now I have to remove it off my phone and mail it back for a refund?! That’s too much of an annoyance so I will just throw it out and use the second one it came with and hope for the best!
customer_reviews.author: Julie V

customer_reviews.title: Almost good, but flawed.
customer_reviews.text: Should be a 5* rating, but they cut too many corners. The problems: 1. One of the 2 glass covers had a small hair on it. (Mine's all gray so did not come from me.) Impossible to get off without introducing more stuff onto the sticky back surface. Had to throw away. 2. The glass size is exactly the lit screen area, but not the actual screen area. So very difficult to get exactly right. Being off by just 1 pixel means a slight shimmer on edge of screen. Should have been a mere 1 mm wider.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Pizzorno, ND

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, fits great
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for the first few months. Easy to install, no issues with the touch screen, and smooth surface. The only problem I have with these screen protectors is that it starts to lift on the edges after a while. Specifically, the right edge near the top. This isn’t a high traffic area of where my thumbs go, so it’s not user related. Both screen protectors started to lift in this area, and once I switched to a different brand, I didn’t have the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby White

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, Good protection
customer_reviews.text: The provided step-by-step directions were easy to follow and allowed easy, flawless installation. It’s nice that there are two sets of covers and install materials included in the package, in case either a do-over is needed or in case the first case gets cracked during use. Cover seems sturdy and will definitely help protect the phone screen from scratches. If necessary, the screen pulls away with a fingernail touch easily and with no residue, yet otherwise clings in place with no issues. A removable screen cover is much more convenient (and cheaper) to replace and repair than a trip to the Apple store. Good value, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: It broke very easy
customer_reviews.text: The installation is not really a problem if you are very carefull. If you are not, go to another option. It broke very easily. My phone fell on my plate when i was texting. The screen protector broke on the corner... I don't think that make sense, it wasn't a high distant. This things are very delicate and i think the iphone screen could take the damage without a scratch. The touch screen sensitivity is somehow "slower" or less sensitive. I don't really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Master Yoyawan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I hate leaving bad reviews but I tried these and first bad sign was the “wet” cleaning wipes were basically like tissue paper. Had to use my own cleaner to prepare the screen. Second fault is even after the product is applied I noticed the edges are still sticky and picked up lint when in my pocket. Third..had it one for one day and my dog knocked my phone off my lap and the protector cracked on a rug. I’ve had others not crack on concrete. Will stick with my original more expensive brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Both protectors had flaws and weird installation
customer_reviews.text: I installed the first screen protector and found a tiny imperfection that was causing a bubble, I chalked it up to user error and decided to use the second screen protector because I knew that bubble would drive me crazy. I was absolutely meticulous doing this rather odd process all over again and the second glass protector had even more imperfections on it causing bubbles. Installation was actually pretty weird and the product itself not great. I’ll be ordering a new glass protector from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan E

customer_reviews.title: Protected Iphone 7 from a fall, no shattered screen :)
customer_reviews.text: Listen, these things really work. With a 2 pack, I covered my phone and my daughter's. She dropped her phone (shocker) and I saw a crack. I panicked, but when I took the protector off, voila! The phone had not cracked, the protector did. I bought another 2 pack of course to put another one on her phone right away. So we will see... But the fact that the protector took the brunt of the shock away from her phone was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: JCampanella

customer_reviews.title: OK - not easy  install.
customer_reviews.text: So the protectir seems good but stickers that you use to hinge the screen (so you can align it during installation) don’t stick well enough to the protector for the job, and fall off mid attachment (at the worst possible time) as pulling the backing off the protector requires too much force for the sticker-hinges to handle - I ended up having to eyeball it, once the stickers detached. A frame aligner is better, especially as my Iphone X has a curved edge. I’d prefer a slightly smaller protector so it can align better (without leaving a lip on one side or other). No squeegee with this product either to help push any remaining bubbles out.
customer_reviews.author: mark churms

customer_reviews.title: It’s like magic
customer_reviews.text: I normally struggle to get the cover on my phone without a bubble or dust somehow being in it. This was by far the easiest application EVER! It was like magic when I set it on top of my phone. It magically sealed itself without any little imperfection. I mean not even 1. Normally the screen cover would bug my with the crazy bubbles etc. It was too cool the way it went on so easily. This cover is going to be my go to forever. I don’t review often but this was really cool and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Miss H.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't reach the edges, but it works
customer_reviews.text: I coupled this with a spigen case. Theres a small gap between the case and the screen protector. It's more noticeable without the case there. I've had them together for a few months now and just dropped it on cement. The spigen case was supposed to have a raised edge to prevent the screen from hitting the floor, but it may have landed on uneven pavement or the extra thickness from the screen protector that caused the screen to hit the floor and shatter. All that matters is when I peeled back the screen protector, there was not a single scratch on the actual screen. I'm ordering another one immediately.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Monster Truck Approved
customer_reviews.text: They always try to sell you these for like $40 at the Apple store and I always decline and by the “cheap” ones on amazon. I have use these forever and I have cracked them all the time and I’ve never damaged my phone, but the other day took the cake! I drive a very big truck with very big tires and I set my phone on my tire like an idiot... And then I rolled over it with my very big truck and my very big tires. It SHATTERED the screen protector...and ONLY the screen protector. Thanks to these gems and an OtterBox Slimcase, my phone is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla D Dupuy

customer_reviews.title: Meh, not something I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I noticed it got dinged up a lot compared to my screen itself so it is not very durable, with one small drop you can expect lots of cracks. It does it’s job protecting your screen but only lasts about 2 months even with someone who is careful and clean with their phone. It just isn’t worth the money unless it is for temporary use until your better screen protector comes in. It smudges, scratches, and very dirty with finger prints and dust super easy. I think giving it a 3/5 is on the nicer side but for temporary use it works well but not intended for long term use imo.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: This is the one
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased a lot of screen protectors for myself and my family. What stands out here is the installation. The protector comes with a set of tools for each screen included. A wipe, a cloth, a dust sticker, and 3 placement stickers to help you align the protector and keep it where you planned to place it. I’m generally pretty bad at this screen protector placement job (I’ve even paid others to do it for me!), but this time it was perfect. Not because I got better at all, simply because JETech gave me the right stuff and easy to understand directions.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy B

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different screen protector with my phone. On the first drop it cracked that protector but kept my screen safe. Now I have this one. I hope I don't ever have to update this review because of a drop but if it happens I will. For now, I can review installation, which was easy enough, and say this protector does not affect the function of the phone in any way.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPhone 11 Pro and I needed a replacement screen protector. This screen protector was a bit smaller than my old one which made the installation process a pain because there was no room for error. Would not purchase again and would not recommend for an iPhone 11 Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Have saved my phone many times!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these for years, these are great and have saved my phone many times! I recently tripped and smacked my phone that was in hand on the driveway really hard, and I thought for sure my actual phone screen would be broken under the cracked protector. But I peeled the protector off, my iphone was unscathed! These things are great, and for the price you can’t beat it. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paula’s tunes

customer_reviews.title: Shattered the first day I installed it.
customer_reviews.text: I guess the point of a screen protector is that it is supposed to break instead of the actual screen, but this one broke almost immediately. I was outside & I laid my phone face down on the table so it did not heat up from direct sunlight, picked it back up a few minutes later & the protector had shattered. It was not dropped, hit or anything. Luckily it came in a multi pack, so I applied a different one that night. It lasted a few weeks, but when I went to take off my phone case, this one shattered too. It started at the corner & looked like a spider web traveling down the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: Clear, no issues with touch screen, only things is it doesn’t quite fit all the way to the edges of the screen on iPhone 11 Pro. But, my husband has a similar glass screen cover by a different company and it’s exactly the same fit, a gap around all the edge as/sides so it leaves me to believe it’s not a product issue but just they way the phone is designed. It does cover the active part of the screen just that small gap between screen edge and cover edge is left open/exposed. I had a galaxy prior with wrap around the edges screen so this might just be I’m not used to the iPhone screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good protection so far!
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector is great. The notch at the top didn’t fit perfectly, but nothing to complain about. It fits, no bubbles, came with all the cleaning supplies to make my screen perfect before installment as well. The directions were confusing, too hard to follow. But fortunately, it’s pretty straight forward is you just freehand it and just place the screen protector on. The directions attempted to use stickers connected to the back to like wrap the screen protector on. Yes that doesn’t make sense, but neither did the directions. Good screen protector so far!
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Issue with depth of product in slimmer cases
customer_reviews.text: Every thing about the screen protector from an installation stand point is excellent. Unfortunately both of my screen protectors appeared to shatter within one day of use. I don’t know if they were just a hair too thick for the case that I happen to be use. I switched out to a slightly thinner version and so far so good. I only gave 3 stars because I only got 1 day of use out of the product, which was disappointing. However, it is possible that it would stand up better with a thicker case (extends far enough out in front of the phone).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m on my third and I’m still impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I’m on screen protector number three, and I’ve been impressed with each one. Both times my phone was dropped, this screen protector absorbed the impact and protected my phone’s screen. It was also easy to remove after it shattered both times. Installation is a little tricky, as the iPhone X has a curved screen so the screen protector is a little smaller than the phone screen. Getting it lined up was a little tricky but not too difficult. The touch screen works great with this protector and there is no noticeable extra glare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracks that never should have happened in the first place!
customer_reviews.text: Just because the tempered glass cracks doesn’t mean this product has saved your precious iPhone screen from a potential disaster. The glass is of horrible quality. It cracked within two days of installing without any falls or heavy impacts. My old tempered glass screen protector protector lasted 2 years without a single crack. I only replaced it because I felt like it was time for a refresh. That product was 12 dollars vs the 7 dollars I paid for this. I guess sometimes it’s best to not buy the cheaper options.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the produce
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the product is very good. Rather easy to install and appears to de a quality product. I rated this item as 4 Stars overall because I utilized both screen protectors (one my wife's and one for my phone). The product that I placed on my phone left a much wider non-sealed strip around the edges than the one I placed on my wife's phone. This leads me to believe, the items were not identical in size (my opinion). I will be replacing the one utilized on my phone in the near future. Both phones are iPhones X's.
customer_reviews.author: kik48477

customer_reviews.title: Cracked without dropping
customer_reviews.text: Cracked down the middle in one week from basic use. Never dropped it just had 2 penny’s in the same pocket I had my phone in. Put a crack all the way from the top to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect combo with an otter box
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to install (though caution to my fellow dog owners, be very careful to get all the hair), and VERY effective. My phone fell off a ledge, landed face down and, despite the otter box, hit a rock dead on and got a huge crack. I left this shield on for MONTHS, afraid to see my brand new iPhone cracked underneath. When I finally peeled it off, my phone screen was COMPLETELY fine. I’ll never go without a screen protector again!!
customer_reviews.author: Meg O.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, easy to install and best prices along with safe and Nice Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I have been using JETech since my iphone 5 and always had a good experience. In fact this time I ordered my cover even before my phone arrived knowing that the product will be best of quality and will be easy to install. I will always recommend for the value JE tech deliver along with the price. Additionally, I used their warranty once and had a very good experience with that as well. I would certainly recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Always have on hand
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for years and for several different phones. These protect your glass.. period. If you have a screen protector and you drop your phone, replacing these little things are so easy. I use a lint roller after cleaning the screen and extra scotch tape for grip of the glass when replacing because what you do get isn’t always enough, it’s best to skip that frustration. All of my phones glass look new because I keep these on. Also, if by chance you did crack your screen because you didn’t have one on, these will help it from getting worse and it looks a lot better until you replace the screen or the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Estes

customer_reviews.title: Beware if you own an IPhone Xx series
customer_reviews.text: The last time I bought them I was pretty disappointed. All three shattered when I dropped my phone. They did protect the screen though. Turns out, it's not a screen protector issue but a case issue. With the IPhone X series you have to be careful to buy a case that protects the edges of the phone and allow the screen protector to fit in, not above or you will go through a lot of screen protectors, no matter what brand
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My phone dropped at least 3 times in the last couple of months & not even the screen protector make a scratch. It’s definitely a deal. Only reason for 4 stars is due to aesthetics. I accidentally dropped hand sanitizer on the back of my phone and it worked its way to the front through my screen protector so I had to change it. After putting the second one on I noticed three bubbles in the middle of the phone. No biggie still works but it would be nice if it was clear.
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful Mystery

customer_reviews.title: The only company I buy screen protectors from
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying screen protectors from JETech for about 4-5 years. On my iPhone X, it makes it look new. I love it, my old screen protector saved my phone from getting cracked on the front of it, thanks to JETech. I thought the screen was cracked when I dropped my iPhone on my new hardwood floor for the first time ever and when I realized there was a crack on it, that's when I knew it was thr screen protector instead. Saved my life at that moment!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Shattered after light drop
customer_reviews.text: Had this screen protector on for about a week. I dropped my phone face down from my shopping cart at Target and it shattered the protector but saved my iPhone screen. So I guess it did what it was suppose to, but I’m disappointed with it’s durability. Other screen protectors have seemed to be much tougher than this one, bc this was not a hard drop by any means. Luckily it came with 2 in the package, so I had a replacement but I won’t order this brand again. One positive was it had 2 cleaning clothes and 2 dust removing stickers, for both protectors. Easy to install with the guidance stickers.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Scratches just from putting in your purse
customer_reviews.text: Repurchased from the same listing since the first time I bought it they worked great! No scratches and kept my phone safe. This time I bought it they came packagers differently. The first time they came packaged individually and the second time, they came packaged both in one yellow package. This new batch scratched within the hour! I never had this problem with my screen protector before as its supposed to be tempered glass and not plastic. Will not be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Alonso

customer_reviews.title: SOLD.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this glass screen protector, pkg. of 2. JETech Tempered Glass Screen Prot. and it is the best investment I have made in a long time. Have put a new JETech protector on but am ordering two more to have as backups. This works. Mine looked like some of the photos on these reviews and I was so afraid it was Iphone screen - NO, it was not. Great product. Easy to put on and stays on until you remove it.
customer_reviews.author: someoneouthere

customer_reviews.title: Might as well just crack your screen
customer_reviews.text: My pinky is more anti-scratch than this. The very first day it put it on it was full of scratches. I mean it was satisfying to install, but if I wanted something satisfying I'd just go watch slime videos or something stupid. ALSO, the second day I installed it, it started "ghosting" I mean the screen would just start moving by itself, it was creepy. The second I took it off it stopped, but silly me put the second one one thinking it would be any different, but newsflash, it wasn't. Anyway, I'm not mad, this is not aggresive, in fact I'm very happy, so happy I wanna die. God Bless You and This Company God Knows It Needs It.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I avoided putting this on my phone because it is usually an annoying process, but I finally got around to it and wish I had sooner! This was the easiest installation of a screen protector I’ve ever had. I read the directions and thought the hinge stickers wouldn’t be necessary but I used them and it really did help. Much better than holding a sticky piece with one hand while trying to wipe off dust with the other. Also my screen sensitivity is the same as without the screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: L in Longmont

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time i am actually using it in my own phone but my daughter has been using it for a while now. It is easy to install, it really does the job its ment to do. The experience with my daughter’s screen protector made me want to buy it for my own phone. It feels great! It remains sensible to the touch, the same experience as having the unprotected screen. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Evega

customer_reviews.title: Smh, Just not durable enough
customer_reviews.text: I love the crystal clear finish but that is one of the only positive things it has going. The smudge marks are very apparent on the glass. The anti glare is ok but could be better. The main issue is the durability. I dropped my phone a total of 2x now and it cracked on the 1st drop once but cracked in 2 different place the second time it was dropped. Both drops were barely from 5ft (I’m 5’5”), but when in use u can barely see the cracks.
customer_reviews.author: RakS1986

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this two pack of JETech screen protectors because I have used their screen protectors before and have been really pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: My wife an I both got new iPhone X's. I purchased this two pack of JETech screen protectors because I have used their screen protectors before and have been really pleased with them. These are no exception. The fit is just right. Easy to put on and they have a really good coating that helps to keep finger printing to a minimum and they clean really easily.
customer_reviews.author: g money

customer_reviews.title: Seemed great, but broke immediately.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the protection it appeared to offer to my new phone, however, the screen protector cracked almost immediately. I kept it on for a week, and then changed to the new one. I did not drop my phone, but the new protector also cracked the same day. I wanted to like this product, but don't understand what the problem is. It did look great, was anti-glare and touch screen was good, but I will have to look for a different screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My go to screen protector
customer_reviews.text: I am HARD on my phone. I generally go through several screen protectors a year. I have used a variety of brands but after trying several that crack without any clear trauma I have bought this brand exclusively. They don't break at the slightest bump, it is simple to install and fits well without impacting responsiveness. I keep an extra ready to go at all times so that my phone never goes unprotected.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Initial impression: high value, recommended
customer_reviews.text: Initial impression: high value, recommended. Two screen protectors are included. No fancy frame to help with placement, but the tape tab hinges work fine to help ensure accurate application. A less sophisticated approach than a fancy plastic frame, but effective and well worth the reduced cost. Also, application was bubble-free and every bit as effective as screen protectors I’ve used recently which cost considerably more. Well done, JETech.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Avoid purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gone through all 3 screen protectors within a matter of two week span. The initial one shattered when I dropped my device from my truck. This is understandable to an extent as I’ve used other screen protectors in the past which dropped from far greater heights and tougher terrains (gravel and dirt). To be on my last one shows the quality of this product and I’ll be avoiding from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Chase W

customer_reviews.title: No more expensive crappy Zagg screen protectors for this guy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been paying premium price for the past 4 years for Zagg screen protectors for all my Apple products. I got sick of paying the $10 replacement fee at the Kiosk in the mall just outside the Apple Store time and time again only to have them last a week or so if I was lucky. I purchased these based on a recommendation from a colleague and couldn’t be happier. Easy to install, no air bubbles, no issues!! Don’t waste your money on expensive (Zagg) screen protectors, these are much better and way cheaper!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try these first!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Try these first before spending $50 for ONE screen protector like I did from Apple when I bought my phone. That one cracked within days (Without being dropped). I’ve had this one for months and reordered to replace my daughter’s. She dropped her phone and while the protector cracked, it did it’s job and the screen is fine. No issue with glare, but I gave it 4 stars for glare bc it does not specifically have anti-glare properties.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schmier

customer_reviews.title: Unless you want a cracked screen DO NOT BUY! Does not protect phone
customer_reviews.text: These screen protectors are not tempered glass, they feel like plastic. My screen cracked really badly with cover on. All and all DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. I wish I went with another manufacturer because now I need to shell out $100 to replace my Iphone screen because this protector is cheaply made and does not keep your screen safe. Learn from my mistake and buy from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Ian S

customer_reviews.title: The most perfect screen protector application of my life
customer_reviews.text: I followed their directions, and unlike usual, I ended up with my screen protector perfectly lined up, and without a single bubble! This has made my life much easier, and I can also vouch that the last screen protector I bought was also from JETech, and worked beautifully, saving my phone when I literally dropped it on its face on concrete. Replacing phones has been the bane of my existence until I got my hands on a nice case and a perfect screen protector!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, and protects the screen.
customer_reviews.text: They work. Easy to install, and when I've used these in the past and dropped my phone, these would shatter but the actual screen would be perfectly fine. And when they shatter, they stay in one piece usually, and you can just peel it right off. Then you just throw on the extra one it comes with or order more since they're priced well.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great for IPhone 11 and IPhone X
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 2-pack deal to use in two phones in our household: an IPhone 11 Pro and an IPhone X. It fit very well for both. The package came with 2 complete sets that included the glass protector, cleaning cloth, dust removal sticker, and a wet wipe. All was individually and securely packed. The installation was not difficult. Just make sure you use the dust removal sticker after you use the wet wipe and cleaning cloth because if there’s any tiny particle left in the screen, you’ll be able to see it after you put the screen protector on. I’ll update this review after there are any accidents as to the effectiveness of the protection.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, very responsive to touch
customer_reviews.text: I had a different tempered glass screen protector on my phone prior to this one and was very disappointed with its responsiveness. NOT SO WITH THIS PRODUCT - honestly, it's like there's no protector at all, I haven't noticed any lag or other issues, quite happy. Upon installation I noticed that there seemed to be several areas where the protector edge hadn't properly stuck (i.e. the were some bubbles) but these have since disappeared. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sambiotic

customer_reviews.title: Great installation kit
customer_reviews.text: I loved the installation instructions and kit for installing! It really helps you to clean the screen completely and get the protector placed perfectly on the first try. I have really struggled in the past with bubbles and dirt specs under a screen protector- I hate it and it usually drives me to just take off the protector. This kit made it so easy to install the protector myself!
customer_reviews.author: Carley

customer_reviews.title: 2 cm large gap around screen
customer_reviews.text: The directions are easy to follow yet my first attempt the screen still was not centered...most likely user error. The protection screen is smaller than the phone screen area even with case on there is still some exposure. For the low price and coming with two screens hoping it does the job prevent any scratches and cracks. There is a lifetime warranty if you register within 15 days of buying.
customer_reviews.author: LorraineFMTX

customer_reviews.title: Best Glass Screen Protector I’ve Purchased
customer_reviews.text: This was the first glass screen protector I put on this phone (the first one was installed when I got it). I’ve never had an easier time putting one on and have it line up just right. The instructions were super clear and the stickers to line everything up are genius. No bubbles, excellent touch performance, and it feels like there’s nothing there. Plus, they’re cheap. What else can I say? These are great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P.

customer_reviews.title: Great value so far.
customer_reviews.text: Edit: it cracked at the beginning of August. I drop my phone a lot, but expected a little more durability. Oh well you get what you pay for 🤷🏽‍♀️ Super good value for what it is. I had a hard time putting it on the “right” way. I should have just done it based on my past experiences so it’s not the products fault per se that I wasted one of the screens. Anyways very happy once I put the screen on the way I always have on my phones. The air bubble even fixed itself over time. I’ve had it on my phone for about a week so we’ll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. E

customer_reviews.title: fits well, easy to install, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. My first few (3 or 4) screen protectors all cracked within days; every time I dropped the phone. What can I say, I have butterfingers. Then I spent nearly 2 years with a cracked protector until one day I cut my finger on it. Then I bought the cheapest protector I could find on amazon (this one) and it has so far survived many drops, key scratches and what not. Doesn't have a scratch on it and looks good as new. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Anik Iqbal

customer_reviews.title: Swipe up wouldn’t work on iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install but I wasn’t able to use my swipe up on my screen for my iPhone X so I had to remove it. I tried moving it up and moving it down (Knowing I was sacrificing one because it would get bubbles) but still wouldn’t work. I’ve used this brand before on other phones successfully but just couldn’t get it to work for my X.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: My phone cracked
customer_reviews.text: I have never had my phone crack underneath when I have a screen protector on. The screen protector usually cracks but the phone is fine. Well I used one of these and it cracked, along with my brand new iPhone X. I tried to email them but it was unable to be delivered or something. I had to get my screen replaced and will never buy these again. If I could give 0 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Cami Crisler

customer_reviews.title: Fit well and easy to install. Didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: These fit well and were easy to install with the included installing kit. They were nice at first and had a smooth glide and resisted finger prints well, but I started having mysterious cracks and divots appearing after just a few days. I didn’t drop my phone or handle it roughly, so I’m not sure where they came from. I’ll stick to other brands from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Cayla

customer_reviews.title: its a screen protector - and seems to do the job
customer_reviews.text: I applied this product to my phone when I got my phone. While I don't tend to drop my phone, it has taken a couple of tumbles without breaking. Last night, my phone fell and the protector did crack. I took off the cracked one, re-cleaned my screen and applied the 'backup' protector. Now, I need to order another set - just in case.
customer_reviews.author: wills_dad

customer_reviews.title: This did exactly what it was designed to do!
customer_reviews.text: I fell down tonight using my flashlight on my phone to look at a map instead of looking where I was going. When I fell I threw out my hands to catch myself. I had my phone in my hand and crunch went my screen... at least that’s what I thought. In fact my first words were “I just shattered my screen” bu in fact the only thing damaged was the glass on my screen. My phone screen wasn’t even scratched. This glass cover did exactly what it was designed for, it protected my phone with its life. RIP five star JETech glass screen protector!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Moss

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector for the price. Warranty was honored.
customer_reviews.text: Great screen protector just need a bit of practice to install it correctly but once its on, it stays on. I ordered these a while back and one of side lifted up randomly, I send in a picture of it and the customer service replaced the item right away without much hassle. Tip for those who have problem with tiny bubbles after installation - just press and hold the bubble area with your finger for like 45-60 seconds it'll go away.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: This was soooo easy to apply! It felt like a quality piece of screen protector, not a flimsy piece of plastic. I actually did get a few scratches on it but didn't try to switch out a new one for the longest time because it was so sturdy on, I thought it would be super difficult to remove. It was surprisingly easy to remove! I cannot recommend this enough, it protects and is soooo easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I normally struggle to get the cover on my phone without a bubble or dust somehow being in it. This was by far the easiest application EVER! It was like magic when I set it on top of my phone. It magically sealed itself without any little imperfection. I mean not even 1. Normally the screen cover would bug my with the crazy bubbles etc. It was too cool the way it went on so easily. This cover is going to be my go to forever
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Gore

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. I normally don’t like to use either phone case or protective sticker, but I needed to use one when I dropped my phone causing it to have a long crack on the screen. So I have been using it on top of my cracked screen for year and a half. So far, there is no cracks or scratches even though I dropped my phone numerous time since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Khulan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: First screen cracked less than two weeks after getting it and I’ve never dropped this phone or hit it on anything. Took the screen protector off and it was very flimsy and thin. Anything can rack these protectors!
customer_reviews.author: Pnut Budder

customer_reviews.title: Glass > Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Significantly better than an equivalent plastic protector, if for no other reason than the hardness. Annoying that you have to buy two, but 1) it’s still cheaper than equivalent in store options, and 2) understand that this has to be commercially viable somehow. I ended up replacing the plastic protector on my old pixel with the spare. Almost fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glass protector screens for my iPhone X. They work well with the touch screen, are easy to install and I have not had any issue with glare. They have kept my phone protected and I am clumsy and drop things a lot. This screen has been on for over one year and still has broken or scratched and with the amount of times I have dropped my phone...I’m astounded!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to whether or not it protects because I haven't dropped my phone yet. However, it leaves my phone screen looking bad because the edges of the protector are bubbled up and it won't smooth out (yes, my screen was spotless upon installation). Also, there are better screen protectors out there that cover the ENTIRE face of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great for the accident-prone and moms
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after AT&T wanted $50 for ONE tempered glass screen cover and boy, am I glad I did! I have been using the first one I put on for over a month and it still looks almost like new. My phone has been dropped on vinyl flooring, laminate, pea stone, 1” pebble stone, and in parking lots (mom with small kids. The dropping was not all me) and the glass hasn’t even started chipping away on any of the edge nor is it cracked. With some simply cleaning wipes, any goo and sticky finger prints get erased like it was never there. Needless to say when I eventually get through my first pack, I’ll be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: They're alright
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. It's a good price for what it is. The anti-fingerprint protection ends, but it also ends on more expensive glass screen protectors. The installation is relatively easy. I'd buy these again just because they're so cheap. I'd consider these to be replaceable/disposable. These can and probably should be replaced every three weeks or so, to keep maximum smudge protection.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Chavira-Coria

customer_reviews.title: Does its job!
customer_reviews.text: Days after I installed the screen protector, I dropped my phone “screen-flat” on the gravel road. The protector was badly cracked which made me really scared; but after taking it off, my screen was completely fine with no scratches or cracks. It saved my phone screen!! I thought I might not need it since it’s been a long time since I dropped my phone, but thank goodness I bought this screen protector for just-in-case scenarios and good thing I had a 2nd one to replace the one that got cracked.
customer_reviews.author: snowhitney

customer_reviews.title: Beware: WAYYY to SMALL for my 11!!
customer_reviews.text: I READ much of the reviews, and the reviews said that it fits the iPhone 11 Pro Max...IT DOES NOT!!! This screen protector will NOT protect my screen. I drop my phone occasionally, and the cracks start from the side of the phone. THIS is SMALL, and it leaves over an INCH space at the bottom, ad about a 1/4 in on the sides!! Hopefully, I am able to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: MOVERMYERIII

customer_reviews.title: East to install!
customer_reviews.text: I am horrible at placing screen protectors and this was so easy! I actually didn’t use the stickers it comes with to help align the screen protector and it still want on easily, with no bubbles to push out. I also didn’t realize there was two included so this was a steal compared to what others cost on Amazon or if you go to w-mart, target, etc.
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyLaineG

customer_reviews.title: Good cover!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, hasn’t scratched and I am very hard on my phone as I am a union electrician. The only complaint is that the screen protector seems like it is cut a little small for the phone, but it still works well. Take your time prepping your phone with what they give you, especially the sticky back. I spent Like 10 mins going Over it with the sticky pad. Makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Broke first day
customer_reviews.text: Shattered on first day of use. Didn't drop or bang the phone into anything. Went to take a shower picked up phone and completely spidered. Cheap for a reason. My other protector lasted almost 7 months and dropped phone, hit the corner of a countertop but no damage to actual glass. Will get that one again, not even going to bother installing the second protector.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro S

customer_reviews.title: Love these protectors
customer_reviews.text: I've used them for several different phones. They've always arrived intact and work exactly as expected. The last one took a hit when I dropped the phone. The phone was fine, but the protector developed a fine crack and had to be replaced. They are a bit of a pain to install, but that's just the nature of the beast.
customer_reviews.author: Keighlar

customer_reviews.title: Shatter Saver
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector definitely saved my screen from cracking or even shattering. After someone dropped my phone from about 7-8 feet high, I immediately thought the screen would have some cracks in it. Only the protector itself had cracks and I just peel it off and replace with the secondary one that comes in the box. Also the help of a phone case saved other damage. Side note: no screen protector is smudge proof but it’s extremely east to clean off.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod William Smith

customer_reviews.title: Crap. Broke within a day or two.
customer_reviews.text: Cracked in the first two days. The system to put this screen on is the best I’ve ever seen. The characteristics of this screen are fantastic and the price point is awesome!! But it cracked so easy. I am incredibly disappointed with this product. I don’t think I would recommend it based on how fast it broke in multiple places. I’ve bought cheaper screens that have lasted wayyyy longer. Not happy. Considering a return or at least a complaint email.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: As an experienced screen protector installer I have to score 5 stars. This uniquely cut iPhone XS/X protector is an easy replacement for the previous cracked one I had. If you don’t know how to install the protector than this double pack might be what you need. I’m only going to need one but maybe I’ll use the second protector if I still have the phone after a year. That’s how long the identical previous protector lasted one year.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Jetech takes care of it's customers!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this product. The bottom part of my screen protector cracked about 2-3 months into my purchase and the crack went across the product. I contacted support about this and within 3 days, they had another one shipped out to me which has now been working great! If you're going to spend money, spend money on a product and people that actually take care of you. I would 10/10 buy any product from jetech again.
customer_reviews.author: Sagar

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but too sensitive to pressure
customer_reviews.text: Protects screen as it should, but is really fragile. I’ve gone through 2 of them in 8 months. And I have only dropped my phone 1 time in that period of time. I barely nicked it on a counter corner once. The second time I was holding it in my mouth when I opened the door to my house and the top portion cracked. Works well, but easily breakable.
customer_reviews.author: SBSF2004

customer_reviews.title: Both covers lasted 3 days with no drops.
customer_reviews.text: Gave a one star because both protectors cracked in 3 days. I have yet to drop my phone since putting either one on. Yes, seems far fetched but I was just as surprised when I caught my phone at the right angle only hours after installation to see a hairline crack. Pretty irritating that it would be that weak. Anti-glare, easy to install, and touch screen all received 5 stars but it doesn’t really matter when the product doesn’t hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT & EASY INSTALL
customer_reviews.text: *Update* Purchased again and still LOVE them!! I STAY with an extra screen protector for each device in the house. NEVER have to fear a broken screen when they're in stock to replace when the protector cracks and does its job ensuring the actual screen doesn't have a scratch on it. Having put MANY a cellphone screen protector on this was by far the easiest and most well prepared packaging. It included everything for pre-cleaning and extra guides for easy install. Will definitely purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: MzOnPointPromo

customer_reviews.title: It is good but not very flexible!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for two iphone 11 screen protection. The first one got a crack while I was taking out the air under the screen , so you need to be very careful when you put the screen on !! I recommend to find better brand , if not you need to be very careful when you put the protection screen ! Good luck !!
customer_reviews.author: Dlawar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: I received this two pack today and was nervous to apply it because I’m awful at putting screen protectors on. This was super easy to do and came with extras like a small cloth and screen cleaner, as well as application tabs (which I did not end up using the tabs to apply and it still came out very well.) It seems to be great quality. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jjeffers89

customer_reviews.title: Super clear, no scratches
customer_reviews.text: JETech screen protectors work well. They are super clear and install without bubbles, if you first clean the surface well. Con: Although I will not go back to plastic film screen protectors, glass ones don't last very long. They crack easily if you apply any pressure at all. When on a ladder, for example, with the phone in my pocket, if I steady my leg against the side with any pressure... Pop.
customer_reviews.author: No Bone To Pick

customer_reviews.title: Best Screen Protector I Have Tried
customer_reviews.text: The best screen protector I have tried. Very easy to install, guides, cleaning supplies included. I hate the look and feel of a screen protector on my phone, but I can’t even tell it’s there. I have been using it for over a week and there isn’t a scratch on it. My last one showed scratches immediately. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

product_meta.title: JETech Screen Protector for iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone Xs and iPhone X 5.8-Inch, Tempered Glass Film, 2-Pack
feature_bullets: 2-Pack. NOTE: Due to the round edge of iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone XS and iPhone X, the screen protector will NOT cover the full screen, only the flat area
Made with high quality 0.33mm thick premium tempered glass with rounded edges exclusively for iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone Xs and iPhone X
Extremely high hardness: resists scratches up to 9H (harder than a knife). High-response and high transparency
Dust-free, fingerprint-free, one-push super easily installation, bubble free
Retail package includes: 2-Pack tempered glass screen protector, cleaning cloth, dust removal stick, guide stick, instructions, customer service card

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars24,468 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
